title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 118 - Rules And Regulations For The Scheduling, Adjourning And Conduct Of Administrative Hearings Relating To Compliance With The Abandoned Property Law

Statutory authority: Abandoned Property Law, §§1412, 1414; State Finance Law, § 8[14]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
